t3eIOqk6YOU6MShf2.name: Injury Tolerance
t3eIOqk6YOU6MShf2.notes: Rider are "Diffuse" but the host in NOT.

m8qfrpSpexyrT8hNM.name: Diffuse
m8qfrpSpexyrT8hNM.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

mFigkcYpyZdadYk2n.name: Homogenous
mFigkcYpyZdadYk2n.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

mF2s0kD015JC8xtD0.name: No Blood
mF2s0kD015JC8xtD0.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

m_Q71PIq8GpAPmVRE.name: No Brain
m_Q71PIq8GpAPmVRE.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

mHHoYhWAXpDge4MGX.name: No Eyes
mHHoYhWAXpDge4MGX.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

mPI7QH6NaVCtkPSOg.name: No Head
mPI7QH6NaVCtkPSOg.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

msrR5VxjqFAYKFC6y.name: No Neck
msrR5VxjqFAYKFC6y.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

mxNwIuBMapZEjBCRR.name: No Vitals
mxNwIuBMapZEjBCRR.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

meDQJ1ZK0m_PzZ4cp.name: Unliving
meDQJ1ZK0m_PzZ4cp.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5

tSfEHs1JzpAJ_LSYv.name: Duplication
tSfEHs1JzpAJ_LSYv.notes:
*The Duplication enhancement on Possession allows the 
Riders to take over another host with a duplicate. Normally this 
duplicate will be under the GMs control as an NPC, though at 
the players discretion he may choose to play the new host and 
allow the GM to take over his current host as an NPC.

muV3815k5oQ_wh816.name: @Very Common Substance: Earth, Metal, Stone, Wood, etc.@

m4mQJXyWzE9NG6Z0X.name: @Occasional Substance: Glass, Ice, Sand, Aluminum, Copper, etc.@

t7317Hnc3KED6Tyau.name: Greed
t7317Hnc3KED6Tyau.notes: Make a self-control roll any time riches are offered – as payment for fair work, gains from adventure, spoils of crime, or just bait. If you fail, you do whatever it takes to get the payoff.

features.situation: from victims of your intolerance (may be as much as -5, at GM's discretion)

t1SgPrDi8QoK2DewO.name: Overconfidence
t1SgPrDi8QoK2DewO.notes: You must make a self-control roll any time the GM feels you show an unreasonable degree of caution. If you fail, you must go ahead as though you were able to handle the situation!

features.situation: from young or naive individuals who believe you are as good as you say you are
